mapper.select: SELECT W.* FROM wrong_word WR INNER JOIN words W ON WR.word_pk = W.word_pk AND WR.member_pk = W.member_pk WHERE WR.member_pk = #{member_pk} ORDER BY WR.reg_dt DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wrong_word ( word_pk, member_pk, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{word_pk}, #{member_pk}, now() )
